question: In which nation "Osa Wildlife Sanctuary" is located?
explanation: Osa Wildlife Sanctuary is located in the Osa Peninsula of Costa Rica. It is also known as Cana Blanca Wildlife Sanctuary. It is an animal rescue centre nursing mistreated, injured, orphaned and/or confiscated animals. Once they are fully rehabilitated they are introduced back to adjacent Piedras Blancas National Park and Corcovado National Park.
